1207.question: What language technologies have been introduced in the past?
1207.response: {'Answer': 'Indic languages didn\u2019t have much language technology support historically, but recently there has been a surge in Indic language technology development.'}
1207.answer:
- Font & Keyboard
- Speech-to-Text
- Text-to-Speech
- Text Prediction
- Spell Checker
- Grammar Checker
- Text Search
- Machine Translation
- Voice to Text Search
- Voice to Speech Search
